long_description: The K2 SpYre 80 ski boots for women offer new intermediates an emphasis on comfort with roomy footbeds, warm liners and soft flex. The K2 SpYre 80 ski boots for women feature roomy, 102mm footbeds that offer a comfortable fit and can accommodate wide feet. Soft plastic makes boots easy to put on when its cold, and forgiving flex is suited to new or cautious intermediate skiers. Soft liners offer warmth and comfort right out of the box, and asymmetric tongues enhance fit and offer a soft feel while you flex your knees into the turn. Women-specific last features a narrow heel, lower cuff for a comfortable calf fit and overall lower volume to maximize comfort and performance.
